name: 3DMark 2001
description:
* License: Legacy,
* Hardware acceleration benchmark software,
* Legacy key: 7QMF2-TSLJR-ESRDD-L3FJF,
* Legacy user: Futuremark,
* Tested: 3DMark 2001 to 2006. 
  They all 'work' with the Futuremark SystemInfo 4.15.0, 
  that "comes from downloading and installing 2006".
* SystemInfo : 4.15.0,
* MP3codec DirectShow,
* DirectX: 8.1,
* D9VK,
* Visual C++: 2010.

execute.command: cd $HOME/Games/3dmark_2001/drive_c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Futuremark/Futuremark\ SystemInfo && WINEPREFIX="$HOME/Games/3dmark_2001/" wine start register_fmsi.bat

content:
files:
- setup: https://benchmarks.ul.com/downloads/3dmark2001.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/MadOnion.com/3DMark2001 SE/3DMark2001SE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: l3codecx
    arch: win64
    description: MP3codec DirectShow ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Visual C++ 2010 libraries ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win81
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8.1 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d9vk_master
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    description: Copying SystemInfo 4.15.0 from 3dmark_2006 ...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Futuremark/Futuremark SystemInfo/
    src: $GAMEDIR/../3dmark_2006/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Futuremark/Futuremark
      SystemInfo/
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: setup
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/3dmark2001.exe
- task:
    description: 3DMark 2001 ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3dmark2001.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: cd $HOME/Games/3dmark_2001/drive_c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Futuremark/Futuremark\
      SystemInfo && WINEPREFIX="$HOME/Games/3dmark_2001/" wine start register_fmsi.bat
    description: Register SystemInfo 4.15.0 ...
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register ExePath ...
    key: ExePath
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\3DMark2001 SE
    type: REG_SZ
    value: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\MadOnion.com\\3DMark2001 SE\\3DMark2001SE.exe
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: 3DMarkRegKey
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\Registration2001
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 7QMF2-TSLJR-ESRDD-L3FJF
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: 3DMarkRegName
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\Registration2001
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Futuremark
system:
  disable_compositor: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
